flows.name: New User Quick Setup
flows.scenario: First-time user with a meeting starting in 5 minutes
flows.goal: Look presentable quickly with minimal learning curve

steps.expectation: Camera view loads showing her face
steps.checkpoint: Can she see herself? Is it obvious this is working?
Does she understand what each button does without tooltips?
Can she find presets? Is improvement immediate and visible?

steps.action: Add name tag with name and title
steps.checkpoint: Is the name tag visible on the video? Can she edit it easily?

steps.expectation: One button to make it available to meeting app
steps.checkpoint: Is it clear the virtual camera is on? Will it work with Zoom/Teams?
watchForTriggered: Virtual camera status unclear from button text

steps.expectation: Airtime output appears in meeting app
steps.checkpoint: Does the meeting app show the enhanced video?

successCriteriaMet: No need to consult help or documentation
Result looks noticeably better than raw webcam
Virtual camera works in meeting app
successCriteriaFailed: Complete flow in under 3 minutes (not measurable)
issuesFound: Some icons lack tooltips for new users (~58% without labels)
Virtual camera status not clearly indicated

flows.name: Mid-Meeting Adjustment
flows.scenario: User is live in a call and needs to fix a problem quickly
flows.goal: Fix lighting/appearance issue without disrupting the call

steps.checkpoint: Is the preview showing what others see?
Does opening the widget cause any visual glitch in output?
Can he see the effect before committing?
Is the improvement applied? Is the UI out of the way?

steps.expectation: Improved appearance, no evidence of adjustment
steps.checkpoint: Meeting participants notice improvement, not the process

successCriteriaMet: No visible disruption to meeting participants
Changes persist for rest of meeting
Easy to undo if adjustment looks worse

flows.name: Power User Customization
flows.goal: Create and save a custom Look with personalized name tag

steps.action: Browse Look presets to find a starting point
steps.checkpoint: Can they see what each Look does before applying?

steps.action: Select a Look and enter edit mode
steps.expectation: Clear path from preset to customization
steps.checkpoint: Is it obvious how to customize vs just apply?

steps.action: Customize background style and presenter shape
steps.checkpoint: Do changes preview in real-time?

steps.action: Set up name tag with custom text and style
steps.checkpoint: Enough variety for professional looks?
Can they make subtle adjustments?
Where does the saved Look appear? Can they find it later?
Can they quickly swap between different saved setups?

successCriteriaMet: Can create distinct professional and casual Looks

flows.name: Away Mode Usage
flows.scenario: Stepping away during a long meeting
flows.goal: Show professional away state without disrupting meeting

steps.checkpoint: Can they enable away mode in under 2 seconds?
What do others see? Is it professional?
Can they show a custom image or reaction?

steps.expectation: Away state maintains while they're gone
steps.checkpoint: Does the away state persist? Any issues with long duration?
observations: Away state can be toggled reliably

steps.checkpoint: Is the transition back smooth? Camera still working?

flows.name: Troubleshooting Virtual Camera
flows.scenario: Virtual camera not working in meeting app
flows.goal: Diagnose and fix virtual camera connection issue

steps.action: Open Airtime, notice virtual camera status
steps.checkpoint: Is it obvious whether virtual camera is connected?
watchForTriggered: Status may be unclear from button text

steps.checkpoint: Does the menu explain what's happening?
observations: Sidebar opened but no diagnostic content

steps.checkpoint: Is there a button to fix the issue?
Do they know if it worked?
Is the issue actually fixed?

steps.action: If still broken, find help resources
steps.checkpoint: Is there a clear path to get more help?
observations: No help option visible in main menu
watchForTriggered: No help option visible in menu

issuesFound: Virtual camera status not clearly indicated on button
No diagnostic menu when clicking virtual camera button
Help/support options not visible in main menu
No clear troubleshooting path for connection issues

overallObservations: App startup and core features work well
Good preset variety across features (37+ presets)
Tooltip coverage could be improved (~42% of buttons have labels)
Help/support resources are hard to find
